Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: If you want to place (content) elements on your webpage via drag&drop, you have to define a content type for the elements, provide a formatter and configure a resource type. What if your element has no real content, when it just renders a search, login or other form, or something else without using content specific values? This element should be a dynamic function! Dynamic functions add functionality to your webpage that does not rely on specific content values.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Content without content? - Use a dynamic function! Here you learn how.
